description:
Enjoy the 4 essential Thai flavors of sweet, salty, sour and spicy in this delicious meal that will redefine how you think about Thai take-out.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: pasta ribbons (ground durum wheat semolina, water, salt), honey powder (honey, corn maltodextrin), freeze dried grilled chicken (chicken breast with rib meat, salt, potato starch, onion and garlic powder, spices), soy sauce [(fermented soybeans and salt), maltodextrin, salt], red & green bell peppers, potato starch, coconut milk powder (coconut milk, maltodextrin, sodium caseinate), peanut flour (peanut flour, defatted peanut flour, peanuts, roasted peanuts, roasted peanut flour, defatted peanuts), white onion, granulated garlic, champignon mushrooms, molasses powder (molasses, corn maltodextrin), garlic, ginger, white sesame seeds, shallots, white onion, sea salt, cilantro, monterey chili powder (chili pepper, spices, salt, garlic), crystallized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice), crushed red pepper, green onion, green chile pepper, natural flavour (baker’s yeast extract, salt, canola oil)
  • Allergens: contains soy, wheat, sesame, milk, peanuts and coconut
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Grilled Chicken Pad Thai
